titles.title: A bill to amend parts B and E of title IV of the Social Security Act to eliminate barriers to providing child welfare services for children and youth in need, to provide additional resources to implement programmatic changes necessary to meet the requirements of the Family First Prevention Services Act, and for other purposes.
Family First Transition and Support Act of 2019
Family First Transition and Support Act of 2019
Family First Transition and Support Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
